QueryViewSpec.Name: Interaction Extension
QueryViewSpec.Description: Provides support for querying on Interaction Extension information.
QueryViewSpec.Author: BETHESDA\cmayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.ID, (select USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERTYPECODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERTYPECODE where USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERTYPECODE.ID = USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[LETTERTYPECODEID]) as LETTERTYPECODEID_TRANSLATION, (select USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE where USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE.ID = USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[LETTERCHILDVERSIONCODEID]) as LETTERCHILDVERSIONCODEID_TRANSLATION, (select USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONFULFILLMENTSTATUSCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONFULFILLMENTSTATUSCODE where USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONFULFILLMENTSTATUSCODE.ID = USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[FULFILLMENTSTATUSCODEID]) as FULFILLMENTSTATUSCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[RESENDCODE], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[EFTBROCHURE], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[DEPARTEDCHILDID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[UNAVILABLECHILDID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[DOUBLESPONSOREDCHILDID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[TRANSFERCHILDID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[PREVIOUSCHILDPROJECTID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[PREVIOUSBIRTHDATE], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[PREVIOUSNAME], ADDEDBY.APPLICATIONNAME as [ADDEDBY_APPLICATION], ADDEDBY.USERNAME as [ADDEDBY_USERNAME], CHANGEDBY.APPLICATIONNAME as [CHANGEDBY_APPLICATION], CHANGEDBY.USERNAME as [CHANGEDBY_USERNAME], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.DATEADDED, USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.DATECHANGED, USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.TSLONG from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT as [ADDEDBY] on [ADDEDBY].ID = USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.ADDEDBYID left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT as [CHANGEDBY] on [CHANGEDBY].ID = USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.CHANGEDBYID
